text:
PMK founder S. Ramadoss and the party's chief ministerial candidate Anbumani Ramadoss at the party's conference in Vandalur on Saturday. — Photo: G.Krishnaswamy.

PMK’s CM candidate Anbumani Ramadoss said he would vacate the office of Chief Minister the moment he realised that he could not fulfil the promises he had made to the people of Tamil Nadu. Page 6
title: Will quit if unable to deliver: Anbumani
